text:
A minor glitch in the examples. The file \webapps\examples\jsp\jsp2\jspx\svgexample.html in Examples web application has the following text:
  • Copy the following URL: http://localhost:8080/examples/jsp/jsp2/jspx/textRotate.jspx?name=JSPX
    • If Tomcat runs on a different port number, the above link to localhost:8080 becomes wrong. I noted this when doing a recursive download (wget -r) of the examples webapp. To fix this one has to convert this static HTML page into a JSP one.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com

text:
(In reply to Konstantin Kolinko from comment #0)
> To fix this one has to convert this static HTML page into a JSP one.

Or just use a relative reference. This should be easy, as the two documents are in the same directory (i.e. no "..", etc. needed).
creator: chris@christopherschultz.net

text:
Fixed in trunk and 8.0.x for 8.0.19 onwards.

I used a relative link and re-worded the surrounding text so a full URL was not required.
creator: markt@apache.org
